api_list.name: Get Stock Price
api_list.description: To get the Stock Price (Delayed 30 mins)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-info.p.rapidapi.com/v1/equity/TCS.NS"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-info.p.rapidapi.com/v1/equity/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
